title: I missed this!?
content:
I have nothing to say, really, except that I can't believe I missed an [Erik Spiekermann Lecture at the BPL](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201314/http:/www.spiekermann.com/mten/index.html). I'd checked his blog a bunch of times in the last three months, and actually <cite>been</cite> to the BPL about a week before this, and somehow stayed oblivious of it.

I don't think I did anything that night either. Depressing.

Edit: Apparently this is a lecture that happens annually, and it was [mentioned right here on Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201314/http:/typophile.com/node/44038). I have no excuse.
author: Ehague

comments.content:
I believe you mean SIR Erik Spiekermann :D

[http://ilovetypography.com/2008/04/01/arise-sir-erik-spiekermann/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201314/http:/ilovetypography.com/2008/04/01/arise-sir-erik-spiekermann/ "http://ilovetypography.com/2008/04/01/arise-sir-erik-spiekermann/")

I'm sorry I missed it too. I'm right at North Station, but I was so swamped with overtime. There's always great stuff at the BPL (and ICA too). We need to keep our eyes peeled little better i guess.
